definition: victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)

sentences.english: Three points in the wave shape, eternal power.
sentences.chinese: 形勝三分國，波流萬世功。

sentences.english: While the shape wins bad things to the extreme, people from Germany are still more rare.
sentences.chinese: 物至極而形勝衰，人至尚則德愈稀。

definition: southern states of Wu and Chu/the middle and lower Yangtze valley
Pengze county in Jiujiang 九江, Jiangxi
Hannan district of Wuhan city 武漢市|武汉市[Wu3 han4 shi4], Hubei

Huaiyuan county in Bengbu 蚌埠[Beng4 bu4], Anhui
watchtower on either side of a city gate/(literary) city/imperial palace
to go back to one's native place and live in seclusion
